thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Couldn't fault our stay
thread.title_full: Couldn't fault our stay - Review of Premier Inn London Tower Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Amanda W
title: Couldn't fault our stay
text: Five minute walk from tower Bridge. Good location for our plans. Room was very clean. Could change the temperature of the room very easily. Staff were very friendly and attentive from the moment we arrived to the moment we left. Breakfast was buffet. Always plenty of food available, hot and fresh. Felt very relaxed in dining room. Was a quiet hotel. Free WiFi. We would definately stay there again.
